annotation_sentence: Yes, um, I like "Rush Hour" a lot. It have good action and... uh, makes me laugh much.
rationale: The subject 'It' is singular, so the verb should be 'has' to agree in number.

annotation_sentence: TV shows, um... I watch "Friends" many time. It is very funny.

annotation_sentence: Animation is... um, very good. Colors and... uh, movements, they are very... real look.
